TextBody:
Hi Peter,

To be accurate in our response, we have to confirm the way to handle changes like these with our server team, as it might not be editable and needs a complete reconfiguration of the Azure AD sync.
One of my colleagues will get back to you as soon as possible.

Thank you,
Eduard Nut
Technical Support Engineer

Endpoint Protector now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection
eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
CoSoSys Ltd
www.endpointprotector.com

TextBody:
Dear Peter,

Thank you for bringing this up into our attention.
Unfortunately for now, as a workaround you will need to remake the sync. Delete the current configuration of the sync and remake it in order to accomodate the new secret.

Best regards,

Adrian Draghici |Technical Support Team Lead (EMEA/Asia/Aus)

TextBody:
Hello Peter,

This message appears when the secret ID is expired. Please find in our User Manual the steps for configuring the Azure AD starting with page 160, chapter 13.2.Azure Active Directory:
https://www.endpointprotector.com/support/pdf/manual/Endpoint_Protector_5_User_Manual_EN.pdf


Best regards,
